alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cleveland, southeastern Grant, northeastern Calhoun, southeastern Dallas and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Kingsland, or 9 miles north of Fordyce, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fordyce... Rison... Kingsland... Hebron... Lamont... Mt Elba... Toledo... Tipton... Staves... Grapevine... Ivan... Farindale... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
